comments: The Molten Lava Burger is a must-try.

details.description: A vibrant eatery known for its unique fusion of American and local flavors. Famous for its hearty burgers, pizzas, and signature dishes.
comments: Loved the unique flavors in the burgers.

menu.name: Bronco
menu.description: Juicy Zinger, smothered in hot sauce, delivering a scorching hot and sour taste.

menu.name: Mighty Rodeo Beef Burger
menu.description: Indulge in our Mozzarella Inferno Burger, featuring two grilled Beef patty stuffed with melted mozzarella cheese, topped with an additional cheese slice, crispy Jalapeños, and tangy salsa sauce.

menu.name: Big Ben Burger
menu.description: Crispy boneless thigh, coated in fluffy flour, topped with iceberg lettuce, juicy tomato, onion, melted cheese, and pink sauce, all served on a soft unseeded bun.

menu.name: Frizza
menu.description: Indulge in our heavily loaded fries, featuring crispy fries topped with grilled chicken, roasted capsicum, spicy sauce, creamy mayonnaise, and melted pizza cheese.
